title: Nerf Olaf.
body: Such a broken ult. How can you CC someone who ults and is immune to CC? You can't. He also can outduel anyone he chooses.  And really? That polo he wears is just, ew.

replies.body: You sound like that guy who told me they should nerf morde
How long has it been since I've seen an Olaf? Somewhere around a year. At least. Maybe even 2. He needs a rework (give him rage, he's the fucking berserker for fucks sake) and/or buffs.
He needs a rework and give him a true identity of a Berseker (A champ that turn more stronger when is nearly to dead)

LMFAO.

Never thought I would see the day. In reality {{champion:11}} could use a buff, I want to see what you think of that and try to prove me wrong.
Anyone with the ability to go untargetable and heal themselves should be in the cellar of league.

I still play him some times, just because I like the champion. He was the first champion I ever bought because he sounded awesome, and was my first main years ago when I first started playing. I quit for a couple years and came back, and hes no bueno anymore.
